about.me: We are a professional team who have been working together for years. In our other life we built and run fiskl.com a global accounting platform. It was through the research of using blockchain to replace traditional invoicing and factoring that turned us into Cardano enthusiasts
about.server: 3 x Intel Xeon 3.5 GHz 32GB Ram & SSD - 3 Relay, 1 Core, Grafana & Promethieus
about.company: ALT-F is a group of five developers & dev ops who have worked together for years and share a common desire to be part of Cardano
